Class MediaUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.util.MediaUtil

extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities for loading media.
    Author:
    lizlooney@google.com (Liz Looney)

      • determineMediaSource

        private static MediaUtil.MediaSource determineMediaSource(Form form,
                                                          java.lang.String mediaPath)
        Determines the appropriate MediaSource for the given mediaPath.

        If mediaPath begins with "/sdcard/", or begins with the path given by Environment#getExternalStorageDirectory(), it is the name of a file on the SD card.

        Otherwise, if mediaPath starts with "content://contacts", it is the content URI of a contact.

        Otherwise, if mediaPath starts with "content://", it is a content URI.

        Otherwise, if mediaPath is a well-formed URL and it starts with "file:", it is a file URL.

        Otherwise, if mediaPath is a well-formed URL, it is an URL.

        Otherwise, if mediaPath it is assumed to be the name of an asset.

        Parameters:
        form - the Form
        mediaPath - the path to the media

      • findCaseinsensitivePath

        private static java.lang.String findCaseinsensitivePath(Form form,
                                                        java.lang.String mediaPath)

        Throws:

      • findCaseinsensitivePathWithoutCache

        private static java.lang.String findCaseinsensitivePathWithoutCache(Form form,
                                                                    java.lang.String mediaPath)
                                                             throws java.io.IOException
        Don't use this directly! Use findCaseinsensitivePath. It has caching. This is the original findCaseinsensitivePath, unchanged.
        Parameters:
        form - the Form
        mediaPath - the path to the media to resolve
        Returns:
        the correct path, adjusted for case errors
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

        Throws:

      • getBitmapDrawable

        public static BitmapDrawable getBitmapDrawable(Form form,
                                               java.lang.String mediaPath)
                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Loads the image specified by mediaPath and returns a Drawable.

        If mediaPath is null or empty, null is returned.

        Parameters:
        form - the Form
        mediaPath - the path to the media
        Returns:
        a Drawable or null
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • loadSoundPool

        public static int loadSoundPool(SoundPool soundPool,
                                Form form,
                                java.lang.String mediaPath)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Loads the audio specified by mediaPath into the given SoundPool and returns the sound id. Note that if the mediaPath is a content URI or an URL, the audio must be copied to a temp file and then loaded from there. This could have performance implications.
        Parameters:
        soundPool - the SoundPool
        form - the Form
        mediaPath - the path to the media
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • loadVideoView

        public static void loadVideoView(VideoView videoView,
                                 Form form,
                                 java.lang.String mediaPath)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Loads the video specified by mediaPath into the given VideoView. Note that if the mediaPath is an asset or an URL, the video must be copied to a temp file and then loaded from there. This could have performance implications.
        Parameters:
        videoView - the VideoView
        form - the Form
        mediaPath - the path to the media
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
